item.description:
Let's get together to put together a meetup for all those Puggies who live south of Boston. For this first meeting, I will volunteer my fenced yard in Brockton, MA (don't worry, it's a perfectly safe neighborhood of single family homes!), and we can discuss locations for future meetings.

We'll provide biscuits (Old Mother Hubbard, my favorite! sez Clovis) and water for the puggies and coffee and donuts for the Pugaholics.

Other small dogs are welcome, but please ask in advance if you can bring dogs other than Pugs. If you have a bully on your hands, you can bring him too - but be prepared to keep an eye on him. We want everyone to have fun!

If you have questions about your organizor, I've had Pugs since 1985. Everything else you need to know is on my website at http://members.aol.co....

group.name: The South of Boston Pug Meetup Group

item.name: The South of Boston Pug First Meetup
